item.title: Damn
item.description: Description Link to heading Damn bro, Dam! – Note: Find out the city that this dam is in. Flag format is n00bz{City_Name} Solving Link to heading Searching on google images, clicking on “Find Image Source”. Going on the first link(https://www.axios.com/2023/06/06/un-ukraine-russia-dam-collapse-monumental-catastrophe), you can see under the caption it says “Kakhovka dam”. Searching up that on wiki, scrolling down, on the right hand side you can see that it is in “Nova Kakhovka”.

item.title: Lost
item.description: Description Link to heading I got lost. Help me find out where I am. Flag format is n00bz{Name_Of_Pin_On_Google_Maps} Solving Link to heading Check the image meta data to see that the photo was taken in San Francisco. Use google maps and the fact that the photo is in San Francisco to identify the bridge as the Oakland Bay Bridge. At which point you know the photo is in Downtown San Francisco looking east.

item.title: Mission Moon
item.description: Description Link to heading A mission, had planned to land on the moon. Can you find where it planned to land on the moon and the name of the lander and rover? Flag is latitude longitude upto one decimal place. Flag format - n00bz{Lander_Rover_latitude_longitude} for eg - n00bz{Examplelander_Examplerover_12.3_45.6}. Also note that flag is case sensitive! Due to a quite big range of answers, to narrow down your search, use the latitude and longitude provided from this site: blog.

item.title: The online odyssey
item.description: Description Link to heading My friend blackhat_abhinav gave me a ctf challenge and told me that the challenge is full of mystery and he wanted me to solve the mystery and get the flag. Can you help me to get the flag? Flag format:- n00bz{fl4g_h3r3} Solving Link to heading So it’s a very easy challenge. We are given a name i.e brayannoob. After checking the Github profiles we found a commit with usernames

item.title: Try to hack me
item.description: Description Link to heading My friend brayannoob gave me a ctf challenge and told me Try to hack me Solving Link to heading So it’s a very easy challenge. We are given a name i.e brayannoob. After checking the Github profiles we found a commit with usernames We find some username now according to challenge name the username is of Tryhackme so going to https://tryhackme.com/p/brayan234 we can see the flag.
